blocks.name: cayleylem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cayley . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cayleylem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csymg, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c2))), wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c2))), wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c2))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c2)), wcel(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), co(c0, cga, c3)))
  gaid2(hs0, hs1, c0, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), c3, c4)
  galactghm(s0, s1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), c0, c3, c1, c2, c3)
  eqtr4i(c1, cmpt(s0, c3, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, c3, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, c3, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), cv(s1))), cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, cv(s0), c3, cv(s1), c3, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(s1), c4)
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))
  ovex(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.cmpo.s(s0, hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cmpo.s(s1, hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.c(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cayleylem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(SymGrp ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s0[c4]s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2)), c5 =(0 ` c0))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2)), c6 =(Base ` c2))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2)), d(s1, c5))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2), (hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1))‚àà(c0[GrpAct]c3))
  gaid2(hs0, hs1, c0, (hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1)), c3, c4)
  galactghm(s0, s1, (hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1)), c0, c3, c1, c2, c3)
  eqtr4i(c1, (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s0[(hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1))]s1))), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s0[c4]s1))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, c3, (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s0[(hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1))]s1)), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(s0[c4]s1)))
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, (s0[(hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1))]s1), (s0[c4]s1), s0 ‚àà c3)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, s0, c3, s1, c3, (hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1)), (s0[c4]s1), (hs0[c4]hs1))
  oveq12(hs0, s0, hs1, s1, c4)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]hs1)))
  ovex(s0, c4, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.cmpo.s(s0, hs0, hs1, c3, c3, (hs0[c4]hs1))
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c4, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cmpo.s(s1, hs0, hs1, c3, c3, (hs0[c4]hs1))
  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, c4, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c((s0[c4]s1))
  diff.hs1.c(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)
  diff.hs1.c((s0[c4]s1))
}

blocks.name: cayleylem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cayley . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cayleylem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf1(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csymg, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf1(c1, c2, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cgrp), wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c5), cfv(cfv(c0g, c6), c5)))
  fveq1(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6), c5)
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c5), cfv(cfv(c0g, c6), c5), cv(hs0), c5, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c5), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), c4, c5), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c5), co(cv(hs0), c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  grplactval(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c2, c5, c1, c4, c0)
  grprid(c0, cv(hs0), c2, c4, c5)
  syl5eqr(cfv(cfv(c0g, c6), c5), c5, cfv(cres(cid, c2), c5), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  fveq1i(cres(cid, c2), c5, cfv(c0g, c6))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cid, c2), cfv(c0g, c6)), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  symgid(c2, universe, c6)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c2), c5), c5), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  grpidcl(c0, c5, c2)
  fvresi(c5, c2)
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wf1(c1, c2, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c6)))
  cayleylem1(s0, s1, c0, c1, c6, c2, c4, c5, c3)
  ghmf1(hs0, c1, c0, c6, c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c6), c5)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c6))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cgrp))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c6))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cayleylem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí(c1 : c2 ‚Ü£ c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(SymGrp ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c4]s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 : c2 ‚Ü£ c3), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((c1 ` hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 = c5)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, ((c1 ` hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 = c5))
  syl5ib((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c1 ` hs0)=(0 ` c6), hs0 = c5, ((c1 ` hs0)` c5)=((0 ` c6)` c5))
  fveq1((c1 ` hs0), (0 ` c6), c5)
  eqeq12d(((c1 ` hs0)` c5), ((0 ` c6)` c5), hs0, c5, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  eqtrd(((c1 ` hs0)` c5), hs0, (hs0[c4]c5), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ((c1 ` hs0)` c5)=(hs0[c4]c5), hs0 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  grplactval(s0, s1, hs0, c2, c5, c1, c4, c0)
  grprid(c0, hs0, c2, c4, c5)
  syl5eqr(((0 ` c6)` c5), c5, ((= |` c2)` c5), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  fveq1i((= |` c2), c5, (0 ` c6))
  ax-mp((= |` c2)=(0 ` c6), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  symgid(c2, universe, c6)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ((= |` c2)` c5)= c5, c5 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  grpidcl(c0, c5, c2)
  fvresi(c5, c2)
  syl(c0 ‚àà Grp, ((c1 : c2 ‚Ü£ c3)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((c1 ` hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 = c5))), c1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c6))
  cayleylem1(s0, s1, c0, c1, c6, c2, c4, c5, c3)
  ghmf1(hs0, c1, c0, c6, c2, c3, (0 ` c6), c5)
  eqid((0 ` c6))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Grp)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c6))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: cayley
blocks.content: Cayley's Theorem (constructive version): given group ` G ` , ` F ` is an isomorphism between ` G ` and the subgroup ` S ` of the symmetric group ` H ` on the underlying set ` X ` of ` G ` . See also Theorem 3.15 in [Rotman] p. 42. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cayley(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, co(c2, cress, c1))), wf1o(c3, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csymg, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, cmpt(s1, c4, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3jca(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, co(c2, cress, c1))), wf1o(c3, c4, c1))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, co(c2, cress, c1))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, c2)))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, co(c2, cress, c1)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(crn(c3), c1))
  syl5eqel(c1, cfv(csubg, c2), crn(c3), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(crn(c3), cfv(csubg, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, c2)))
  cayleylem1(s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cbs, c2))
  ghmrn(c3, c0, c2)
  eqimss2i(crn(c3), c1)
  resghm2b(c1, c2, c3, c0, co(c2, cress, c1))
  eqid(co(c2, cress, c1))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf1o(c3, c4, c1), wf1o(c3, c4, crn(c3)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf1o(c3, c4, crn(c3)), wf1(c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  cayleylem2(s0, s1, c0, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c2), c5, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  f1f1orn(c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(c3, c4, c1), wf1o(c3, c4, crn(c3))), wceq(c1, crn(c3)))
  f1oeq3(c1, crn(c3), c3, c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c0)
  diff.c0g.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cayley(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c2[|`s]c1))‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üî c1)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(SymGrp ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]s1)))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ran(c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  3jca(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), c3 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c2[|`s]c1)), (c3 : c4 ‚Üî c1))
  mpbid(c0 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c2[|`s]c1)), c3 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2))

  syl5eqel(c1, (SubGrp ` c2), ran(c3), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà Grp, ran(c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), c3 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c2))
  cayleylem1(s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, (0 ` c0), (Base ` c2))
  ghmrn(c3, c0, c2)
  eqimss2i(ran(c3), c1)
  resghm2b(c1, c2, c3, c0, (c2[|`s]c1))
  eqid((c2[|`s]c1))
  sylibr(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c3 : c4 ‚Üî c1), (c3 : c4 ‚Üî ran(c3)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c3 : c4 ‚Üî ran(c3)), (c3 : c4 ‚Ü£(Base ` c2)))
  cayleylem2(s0, s1, c0, c3, c4, (Base ` c2), c5, (0 ` c0), c2)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  f1f1orn(c3, c4, (Base ` c2))
  ax-mp(((c3 : c4 ‚Üî c1)‚Üî(c3 : c4 ‚Üî ran(c3))), c1 = ran(c3))
  f1oeq3(c1, ran(c3), c3, c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c0)
  diff.c0g.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cayleyth
blocks.content: Cayley's Theorem (existence version): every group ` G ` is isomorphic to a subgroup of the symmetric group on the underlying set of ` G ` . (For any group ` G ` there exists an isomorphism ` f ` between ` G ` and a subgroup ` h ` of the symmetric group on the underlying set of ` G ` .) See also Theorem 3.15 in [Rotman] p. 42. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cayleyth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, cfv(csubg, c1), wrex(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, cv(s0))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csymg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, cfv(csubg, c1), wrex(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, cv(s0))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(csubg, c1)), wrex(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))))
  simp1d(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  simp2d(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(csubg, c1)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  simp3d(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))))
  cayley(hs0, hs1, c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  rspcev(s1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  f1oeq1(cv(s1), cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  rspcev(s0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(csubg, c1), wrex(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wrex(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, cv(s0))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  rexeqbidv(s1, co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, cv(s0))), co(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))), wceq(cv(s0), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wf1o(cv(s1), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  oveq2d(c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, cv(s0)), co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cv(s0), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  oveq2(cv(s0), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), c1, cress)
  f1oeq3(cv(s0), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))), cv(s1), c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cghm, co(c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.cghm.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cress, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  diff.cress.s(s1)
  diff.wf1o.s(s1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))))

blocks.pretty:
thm cayleyth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]s0)),(s1 : c2 ‚Üî s0))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(SymGrp ` c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà Grp, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]s0)),(s1 : c2 ‚Üî s0))), ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))),(s1 : c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))))
  simp1d(c0 ‚àà Grp, ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))): c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))))
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà Grp, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))),(s1 : c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))): c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))))
  simp2d(c0 ‚àà Grp, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))): c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))))
  simp3d(c0 ‚àà Grp, ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))): c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))), ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))))
  cayley(hs0, hs1, c0, ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))), c1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))), c2, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))
  eqid(ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))
  rspcev(s1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))), (c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))): c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))), (s1 : c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))))
  f1oeq1(s1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))), c2, ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))
  rspcev(s0, ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))), (SubGrp ` c1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))),(s1 : c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]s0)),(s1 : c2 ‚Üî s0)))
  rexeqbidv(s1, (c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]s0)), (c0[GrpHom](c1[|`s]ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))))), s0 = ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))), (s1 : c2 ‚Üî s0), (s1 : c2 ‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1))))))
